meanings.definition: Preventing or countering the act of hijacking an aircraft or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The antihijacking security measures kept the passengers safe during the flight.
meanings.sent2: The new antihijacking technology is being tested on airplanes.
meanings.sent3: The antihijacking alarm went off when the pilot accidentally pressed the wrong button.
meanings.sent4: The antihijacking protocols acted as a shield against potential threats.
meanings.sent5: The bright red antihijacking sign on the plane was a clear warning to any troublemakers.

meanings.definition: A system or measure designed to prevent hijacking.
meanings.sent1: The airport implemented strict antihijacking procedures to ensure passenger safety.
meanings.sent2: The antihijacking equipment on the plane includes reinforced cockpit doors.
meanings.sent3: The antihijacking system worked seamlessly to protect the aircraft from unauthorized access.
meanings.sent4: The antihijacking measures were put in place to deter any potential threats.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of the antihijacking measures was evident during the emergency drill.
